mapper.sql: CAR_ID, LICENSEPLATE, LICENSEPLATECOLOR, MODELS, PASSENGERS, LICENSENUMBER, TRANSPORTPERMITS, COMPANY, CREATEDATE, FREEZE, OPER_ID, OPER_TIME,technicalgrade
mapper.insert:
select UUID();
insert into wt_cars (CAR_ID, LICENSEPLATE, LICENSEPLATECOLOR, MODELS, PASSENGERS, LICENSENUMBER, technicalgrade, TRANSPORTPERMITS, COMPANY, CREATEDATE, FREEZE, OPER_ID, OPER_TIME) values (#{carId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{licenseplate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{licenseplatecolor,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{models,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{passengers,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{licensenumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{technicalgrade,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{transportpermits,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{company,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, now(), #{freeze,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{operId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, now())
mapper.update:
update wt_cars
LICENSEPLATE = #{licenseplate,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
LICENSEPLATECOLOR = #{licenseplatecolor,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MODELS = #{models,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PASSENGERS = #{passengers,jdbcType=INTEGER},
LICENSENUMBER = #{licensenumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
technicalgrade = #{technicalgrade,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TRANSPORTPERMITS = #{transportpermits,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
COMPANY = #{company,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATEDATE = #{createdate,jdbcType=DATE},
FREEZE = #{freeze,jdbcType=CHAR},
OPER_ID = #{operId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
OPER_TIME = now(),
where CAR_ID = #{carId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update wt_cars set LICENSEPLATE = #{licenseplate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LICENSEPLATECOLOR = #{licenseplatecolor,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MODELS = #{models,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PASSENGERS = #{passengers,jdbcType=INTEGER}, technicalgrade = #{technicalgrade,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LICENSENUMBER = #{licensenumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TRANSPORTPERMITS = #{transportpermits,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, COMPANY = #{company,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATEDATE = #{createdate,jdbcType=DATE}, FREEZE = #{freeze,jdbcType=CHAR}, OPER_ID = #{operId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OPER_TIME = now() where CAR_ID = #{carId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select:
select
from wt_cars
ORDER BY ${sort} ${order}
ORDER BY OPER_TIME DESC
